casebody.data:
No. —, original.

Ex Parte Modern Workmen of the World and the Modern Workmen of the World Society, John B. Kinnear and Samuel J. Masters. October 24, 1927. Messrs. Wi Bissell Thomas, Walter H. Newton-and J. K. M. Norton for petitioners.

Motion for leave to file petition for writ of mandamus herein denied.
